db:abstract.db:para: Provides an interface to the Qt Insight Tracker.

db:section.db:title: enabled : bool
db:section.db:para: This property can be used to enable and disable the tracker.

db:section.db:title: clearCache()
db:section.db:para: Clear all events from the local cache.

db:section.db:title: sendClickEvent(string name, string category, int x, int y)
db:section.db:para: Send a click event name. Event can have extra details with category and click coordinates x and y.

db:section.db:title: sendClickEvent(string name, string category, int x, int y, string contextKey, double contextValue)
db:section.db:para: Send a click event name with additional context data. Event can have extra details with category and click coordinates x and y. Additional context data can be sent as a key/value pair in contextKey and contextValue.

db:section.db:title: sendScreenView(string name)
db:section.db:para: Send a screen view event name.

db:section.db:title: sendScreenView(string name, string contextKey, double contextValue)
db:section.db:para: Send a screen view event name with additional context data. Additional context data can be sent as a key/value pair in contextKey and contextValue.

db:section.db:title: startNewSession()
db:section.db:para: Start a new session A new session id is generated and then used in all subsequent events.
